title: WebQuest-Based Instructional Design for Exploring and Applying American Literature Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online search skills and foundational understanding of American literary works
context.additional_context: Offline collaborative learning environment where pre-service and in-service teachers learn to effectively search for and evaluate digital resources applicable to American literature instruction

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for credible online resources related to American literature using the WebQuest model.
Learners can create a concrete lesson design plan for applying digital learning materials in educational settings.
Learners can critically analyze the educational appropriateness and applicability of materials collected through peer assessment.

resources: List of reliable websites related to American literature
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
